questions.question: Consejo: Asegúrese de tener una bufanda grande y una botella de vinagre (empapar la bufanda en vinagre si la policía usa gas lacrimógeno) en caso de que haya gas lacrimógeno?
¿Hubo alguna protesta relacionada en el pasado (cuántos, cuándo y dónde) y se logró algo?
¿Cómo respondieron las autoridades y la policía a la protesta?
¿Utilizó la policía alguna fuerza no letal (gases lacrimógenos, balas de goma) o fuerza letal (munición real), o ambas cosas?
¿Había alguien herido? ¿Quién, cuántos y qué tan mal?
¿A qué hospitales / clínicas fueron llevados los lesionados para su tratamiento?
Si hay informes de uso violento de la fuerza por parte de la policía, ¿tiene evidencia y usted tiene una respuesta de la policía sobre esto?
¿Cuál es el estado actual de la protesta?
¿Qué tipo de protesta es? ¿Una marcha, una huelga, una barricada?
¿Quiénes son los principales organizadores de la protesta?
questions.description: Obtenga su título oficial, organización y datos de contacto.

questions.question: ¿Fue una protesta planificada o espontánea?
¿Cuál es la razón de la protesta?
¿Hubo alguna ONG o partidos políticos involucrados o relacionados con la protesta?
questions.description: Obtenga sus nombres, organización, datos de contacto y razón para participar.

questions.question: ¿Cuál es el tamaño de la multitud:
questions.description: no adivine! Consulte con los organizadores y la policía.

questions.question: Obtenga una cita (o declaración) de los organizadores sobre la protesta
Entrevista a un mínimo de 10 manifestantes:
questions.description: obtener su nombre, edad, dónde viven, por qué están protestando, ¿qué quieren lograr?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
Tip: Ensure you have a large scarf and a bottle of vinegar (soak scarf in vinegar if police use teargas) in case there is teargas?
Have there been any related protests in the past (how many, when and where) and was anything achieved?
How did the authorities and police respond to the protest?
Did police use any non-lethal force (teargas, rubber bullets) or lethal force (live ammunition), or both?
Was anyone injured?
questions.description: Who, how many and how badly?

questions.question: To which hospitals/clinics were the injured taken for treatment?
If there are reports of violent force from police, do you have evidence and do you have a response from the police about this?
What is the current status of the protest?
What kind of protest is it?
questions.description: A march, a strike, a barricade?

questions.question: Who are the main organisers of the protest?
questions.description: Get their official title, organisation and contact details.

questions.question: Was the protest planned or unplanned?
What is the reason for the protest?
Were any NGOs or political parties involved or related to the protest? Get their names, organisation, contact details and reason for involved.
What is the size of the crowd:
questions.description: don't guess! Check with organisers and police.

questions.question: Get a quote from the organisers about the protest
Interview a minimum of 10 protesters:
questions.description: get their name, age, where they live, why they are protesting, what do they want to achieve?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
Wenk: Maak seker jy het 'n groot serp en 'n bottel asyn (week serp in asyn indien polisie gebruik maak van traangas)
Was daar enige verwante protesoptredes in die verlede (hoeveel, wanneer en waar) en is enige iets bereik?
Hoe het die owerhede en die polisie reageer op die protes?
Het polisie enige nie-dodelike (traangas, rubber koeëls) of dodelike wapens (lewendige ammunisie) gebruik, of albei?
Is enigiemand beseer? Wie, hoeveel en hoe erg?
Na watter hospitale/ klinieke is die beseerdes geneem vir behandeling?
Indien daar gerugte van polisiegeweld is, het jy bewyse en het jy 'n reaksie van die polisie hieroor?
Wat is die huidige stand van die protes?
Watter soort protes is dit?
questions.description: `n Optog, 'n staking, 'n versperring?

questions.question: Wie is die hooforganiseerders van die protes?
questions.description: Kry hul amptelike titel, organisasie en kontakbesonderhede.

questions.question: Was die protesoptrede beplan of onbeplan?
Wat is die oorsaak van die protes?
Is nie-regeringsorganisasies of politieke partye betrokke by die protesoptrede?
questions.description: Kry hul name, organisasie, kontakbesonderhede en rede vir betrokkenheid.

questions.question: Hoe groot is die skare:
questions.description: moenie raai nie! Bevestig met organiseerders en polisie.

questions.question: Haal een van die organiseerders woordeliks aan oor die optrede
Voer onderhoude met ten minste 10 betogers:
questions.description: kry hul naam, ouderdom, waar hulle woon, waarom hulle protesteer, wat hulle wil bereik?

Icebo: Qinisekisa ukuthi unesikhafu esikhulu kanye nebhodlela likaviniga( cwilisa isikhafu kuviniga uma amaphoyisa esebenzisa isisi)
Ingabe sekuke kwabakhona eminye imibhikisho ngaphambili, ( Ingabe yenzeka kuphini nini) ingabe kukhona okwazuzwa?
Ingabe iziphathimandla namaphoyisa enzenjani mayelana nalombhikisho?
Ingabe amaphoyisa asebenzisa ukuxazulula ngendluzula ( isisi, izinhlamvu zenjoloba) (badutshulwa ngezinhlamvu) noma kokubili?
Ingabe kukhona owalimala?
questions.description: Ingabe bangakhi nokuthi ingabe balimele kangakanani?

questions.question: Ingabe abalimele batuthelwe kusiphi isibhedlela noma umtholampilo?
Uma ngabe kunemibiko yodlame olwenziwe amaphoyisa, ingabe unabo ubufakazi nokuthi ingabe athini amaphoyisa ngalokhu?
Ingabe sinjani isimo salombhikisho oqhubeka manje?
Ingabe hlobo luni lombhikisho lolu?
questions.description: imashi, isteleka, noma isivimbelo?

questions.question: Ingabe obani abagqugquzeli balombhikisho?
questions.description: Thola imininingwane yabo okungaba amagama abo, izinhlangano abavela kuzo izinombolo zabo zocingo kanye nezikhundla zabo.

questions.question: Ingabe umbhikisho ohleliwe noma ungahleliwe ?
Yini imbangela yombhikisho?
Ingabe bezikhona izinhlangano ezingenzinzuzo noma izinhlangano zepolitiki kulombhikisho?
questions.description: Thola amagama abo, izinhlangano zabo kanye nezinombolo zabo kanye nesizathu sokuzibandakanya kwabo.

questions.question: Ingabe bebengakanani abantu abebebhikisha ngokwesibalo! Buza kubagqugquzeli kanye nasemaphoyiseni.
Thola okushiwo abagqugquzeli mayelana nalombhikisho.
Xoxisana nababhikishi ababalelwa kwabangu-10:
questions.description: thola ukuthi bahlala kuphi, amagama abo, iminyaka yabo, imbangela yokuzibandakanya, nokuthi yini abaqonde ukukuzuza ngalombhikisho?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
Dica: Certifique-se que você tem um cachecol e uma garrafa de vinagre (molhe o lenço no vinagre se a polícia usa gas lacrimogêneo) em caso de gâs lacrimogêneo
Têm havido quaisquer protestos similares no passado (quantos, quando e aonde) e nada foi alcançado?
Como reagiram as autoridades e a polícia perante a manifestação ou protesto?
A polícia usou alguma força não letal (gâs lacrimogêneo, balas de borracha) ou força letal (munição) ou ambas?
Alguem ficou ferido?
questions.description: Quem, quantos e qual foi a gravidade?

questions.question: A quais hospitais/clínicas foram levados os feridos para serem tratados?
Se há relatos de força violenta por parte da polícia, você tem alguma prova disso e qual foi a resposta da polícia perante isso?
Qual é o actual estado do protesto?
Que tipo de protesto é este?
questions.description: Uma marcha, uma greve, uma barricada?

questions.question: Quem são os principais organizadores do protesto?
questions.description: Obtenha o lema oficial, organização e contactos.

questions.question: O protesto foi planeado ou não?
Qual é o motivo do protesto?
Há alguma ONG ou partido político envolvido ou relacionado com o protesto?
questions.description: Obtenha nomes, organização, contactos e motivo do seu envolvimento.

questions.question: Qual é o número de participantes no protesto:
questions.description: não adivinhes! Confirme com os organizadores e a polícia.

questions.question: Consiga uma declaração dos organizadores sobre o protesto
Entreviste a um mínimo de 10 participantes:
questions.description: aliste o nome, idade, onde vivem, porqué estão a protestar, o quê eles pretendem conseguir?

Icebo: Qinisekisa ukuba une sikhafu eside kwakunye ne bhotile ye vinika (ncinda isikhafu kwi vinika leyo xa amapolisa esebenzisa i-teargas).
Kwakukhe kwabakho iintshukumo zoqhankqalazo eziyelelene nezi kumaxesha adlulileyo (Zazi ngaphi, nini, phi) kwaye ingaba ikhona na into eyaba yimpumelelo?
Iziphatha-mandla kwakunye namapolisa bahlangabezene njani nolu qhankqalazo?
Ingaba amapolisa asebenzisa iintshukumo ezingena bungozi kakhulu (i-teargas, i-rubber bullets) okanye ezinobungozi (imipu) okanye zombini?
Ingaba bakhona abantu abonzakalayo?
questions.description: Ngobani, babe bangaphi kwaye bonzakala kangakanani na?

questions.question: Abo bathi bonzakala babhekiswa kweziphi na izibhedlele okanye iikliniki ukuze bafumane unyango?
Ukuba kukho iingxelo zoku sebenziswa kodlame ngama polisa ingaba unabo na ubungqina kwakunye nempendulo yamapolisa ngesi sehlo?
Ithini imeko yolu qhankqalazo sithetha nje?
Ingaba luqhankqalazo olunjani na olu?
questions.description: Ingaba ngumngcelele, ugwayimbo, uvalo-zitalato?

questions.question: Ngoobani abona baququzeli baphambili kolu qhankqalazo?
questions.description: Fumana izikhundla zabo ezisemthethweni, amaqela abo kwakunye nee nkcukhacha zabo zonxibelelwano.

questions.question: Ingaba oluqhankqalazo belucetyiwe okanye belunga cetywanga?
Yintoni isizathu soluqhankqalazo?
Ingaba ii-NGO okanye amaqela ezo politiko ziyabandakanyeka okanye ziyachaphazeleka kolu qhankqalazo?
questions.description: Fumana amagama abantu, amaqela, iinkcukhacha nezizathu zobandakanyo lwabo.

questions.question: Bungakanani ubukhulu benginginya:
questions.description: ungaziqambeli ngokwakho! Dlana indlebe nabaququzeli kwakunye namapolisa.

questions.question: Fumana intetho nqo yaba ququzeleli malunga noqhankqalazo
Dlana indlebe nabaqhankqalazi abali-10 ubuncinane:
questions.description: fumana amagama abo, iindawo abahlala kuzo, izizathu zabo zokuqhankqalaza, yintoni abafuna ukuyi feza?

questions.question: Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
